sentences.sContent: One student who arrived four minutes late in 2007 was turned away, even though she and her mother knelt before the exam proctor, begging for leniency.
sentences.sContent_eng: One student who arrived four minutes late in 2007 was turned away, even though she and her mother knelt before the exam proctor, begging for leniency.
sentences.sCn: 2007年高考中，一位考生迟到了四分钟就被拒绝入场。 虽然她和妈妈在监考老师面前下跪哀求，最终也未能进入考场。

remMethod.val: 学监 (proctor) 是学校纪律的保护者 (protector)

words.tran: 检察官；代理人；行政长官
代理人之职；学监之职位或任期

trans.tranOther: someone who watches students in an examination to make sure that they do not cheat
